Headline: #100 Jeffery Manor Express Temporary Reroute near 106th/Avenue E
ShortDescription: 100 Jeffery Manor Exp buses temp. rerouted WB: Ave B, 108th, Ave F and 106th; EB: 106th, Ave G, 108th and Ave C due to, street blockage near 106th/Avenue E.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#100 Jeffery Manor Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 106th/Avenue E, due to street blockage.

Westbound buses will operate via Avenue B, 108th, Avenue F and 106th.

Eastbound buses will operate via 106th, Avenue G, 108th and Avenue C.

Allow extra travel time.
